message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its exceptional value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and I'm open to discussing further.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your openness to discussion. Given my budget constraints, I am willing to pay up to $1,050,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.

Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer.  While I understand your budget considerations, the value of this product is truly significant. I could come down to $1,100,000.  I believe this price represents a fair compromise and reflects the immense value this product will bring you.
